Description:
Detects when a new admin role assignment is created. Which could be a sign of privilege escalation or persistence

Author: Nikita Khalimonenkov
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Okta Admin Role Assignment Created
Query: sourcetype='okta-okta' eql select * from _source_ where eventtype = 'iam.resourceset.bindings.add'
